snippet: The Church of England has sold its indirect stake in Wonga, ending its association with the high-interest online lender that came under scrutiny for sending customers bogus letters....

headline.print_headline: Church of England Severs Ties With Payday Lender Wonga
headline.main: Church of England Severs Ties With Payday Lender Wonga

lead_paragraph: The Church of England has sold its indirect stake in Wonga, ending its association with the high-interest online lender that came under scrutiny for sending customers bogus letters.
